We organize expertise to make it universally

visible, accessible and usable.

Who in the organization has a certain set of know-how?

COBRAINER GIVES YOU THE ANSWERS!

Integrate, Visualize, Search, Collaborate

Our software help organisations and employees make faster and more confident decisions when developing new projects, new technologies, starting initiative, or growing workforce.

Accelerate your innovation engine

Cobrainer develops algorithms to automatically learn what know-how and expertise concepts are within text and how different expertise concepts are related to each other semantically.
